attributes.action: Resign,Not inviting a member of The Royal Family to D-Day celebrations in France
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Service Personel swear allegience To Her Majesty The Queen, and as such a representitive of Her's should represent all those who gave in service to our country

rejection.details: Invitations were issued by the French Government, not the Prime Minister. An invitation was issued to Prince Charles, who attended.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
